examples: I take a bath every morning.
The baby loves to play in the bath.
She soaked in a hot bath after a long day at work.
Eu tomo banho todas as manhãs.
O bebê adora brincar no banho.
Ela relaxou em um banho quente depois de um longo dia de trabalho.

suggested: Why did the shampoo bottle break up with the conditioner? It didn't like to share the bath with anyone else.
Baths used to be a place of relaxation, but now it's just another chore on the to-do list.
Why do bath towels get less fluffy over time? Because they're tired of being used to dry off sweaty bodies.
Did you know that taking a cold bath can help with muscle soreness?
The scent of lavender in a warm bath.
The feeling of hot water on sore muscles.
Taking a bath can be a time to disconnect from the world and reconnect with yourself.
